page.title: 01Farm at Johnstonebridge
page.content: I stay at Kirkhill Farm at Johnstonebridge with my Mother,Father and my brothers John and Alec. I help at the weekends and holidays . Mum looks after us and feeds us. We have a lot of grass in our fields. We grow hay , silage ,potatoes and barley. We have 100 milking cows on the farm.Dad does the milking. The milk is collected at 1 o'clock and most of it goes to the cheese factory. We have an International tractor. John does most of the ploughing. They will be digging ditches and are trying to unchoke a drain. The drain is full of muck and my Father cannot push the draining rods up it. Our farm is beside the Railway, the River Annan and the A74 dual carriageway.
